id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

key.description: The key used to identify the product.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the product was created.

createdBy.description: The user who created the product.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the product was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the product.

masterData.description: Contains the main data of the product such as name, description, categories, and other key details.

published.description: The published data of the product.

current.description: The current data of the product.

staged.description: The staged data of the product.

hasStagedChanges.description: Indicates if there are staged changes.

taxCategory.description: The tax category of the product.

state.description: The current state of the product.

reviewRatingStatistics.description: Includes statistics related to the product reviews and ratings received by customers.

averageRating.description: The average rating of the product.

lastMessageSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the last message.

lastVariantId.description: The identifier of the last variant.

versionModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the version was last modified.
